description: woman wearing a black and orange dress and a large black hat, with red hair, holding up her skirts, exposing her white and orange underskirts; other figures wearing bright clothing in background

provenance: [Frederick Mulder Old Master & Modern Prints, London, until 1984; sold in July for PRTO, to Harry Drake]; Harry Drake, St. Paul (1984-d. 2012; bequeathed to MIA).
signed: LRC in the print, in black: [Jacques Villon / 99]
title: Danseuse au Moulin Rouge
